rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Cybil attacks, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. If you do, investigate. [i](Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[i]Hope You Don’t Have to Use It – [/i]{G}, Sacrifice a Clue: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
